titleStmt.title: Paganisme and papisme parallel'd and set forth in a sermon at the Temple-Church, vpon the feast day of All-Saints. 1623. By Thomas Ailesbury student of diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Ailesbury, Thomas, fl. 1622-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Eld, for Leonard Becket,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
